parametertype.name: DURATION
parametertype.description: Duration of this correlated event, this is a long time value in milliseconds

parametertype.name: EVENT_NAME
parametertype.description: The name of an event used in a correlation

parametertype.name: STRING_TYPE
parametertype.description: The name of an event used in a correlation

parametertype.name: MILESTONE_NAME
parametertype.description: The name of a milestone in a correlation

parametertype.name: TIMESTAMP
parametertype.description: A time stamp

parametertype.name: RAT_TEXT
parametertype.description: The name of a milestone in a correlation

parametertype.name: BOOLEAN
parametertype.description: A boolean value

parametertype.name: TEMP
parametertype.description: Duration of this correlated event, this is a long time value in milliseconds

parametertype.name: IMSI
parametertype.description: International Mobile Subscriber Identity
parametertype.detaileddescription: 5-15 digits, TBCD (Telephony Binary Coded Decimal), each digit represented by 4 bits.Padded with '1111' for each unused digit up to a total length of 8 octets/16 digits.For more information see:3GPP TS 23.003 (ch 2.2) for the composition and TS 29.060 (ch 7.7.2) for the coding.

parametertype.name: IMSI_LONG
parametertype.description: International Mobile Subscriber Identity
parametertype.detaileddescription: 5-15 digits, TBCD (Telephony Binary Coded Decimal), each digit represented by 4 bits.Padded with '1111' for each unused digit up to a total length of 8 octets/16 digits.For more information see:3GPP TS 23.003 (ch 2.2) for the composition and TS 29.060 (ch 7.7.2) for the coding.

parametertype.name: IMEISV
parametertype.description: International Mobile Equipment Identity Software Version
parametertype.detaileddescription: 3 sets of digits, 8, 6, and 2 digits respectively. TBCD (Telephony Binary Coded Decimal), each digit represented by 4 bits.Padded with '1111' for each unused digit upto a total length of 8 octets/16 digits. A value of all zeros indicates that IMEISV is not available.

parametertype.name: IMEISV_LONG
parametertype.description: International Mobile Equipment Identity Software Version
parametertype.detaileddescription: 3 sets of digits, 8, 6, and 2 digits respectively. TBCD (Telephony Binary Coded Decimal), each digit represented by 4 bits.Padded with '1111' for each unused digit upto a total length of 8 octets/16 digits. A value of all zeros indicates that IMEISV is not available.

parametertype.name: UINT_1
parametertype.description: Generic 1 byte unsigned integer

parametertype.name: UINT_2
parametertype.description: Generic 2 byte unsigned integer

parametertype.name: UINT_4
parametertype.description: Generic 4 byte unsigned integer

parametertype.name: SINT_4
parametertype.description: Generic 4 byte signed integer

parametertype.name: UINT_8
parametertype.description: Generic 8 byte unsigned integer

parametertype.name: GENERIC_FLOAT
parametertype.description: Generic float

parametertype.name: GENERIC_DOUBLE
parametertype.description: Generic float

parametertype.name: EVENT_RESULT
parametertype.description: Result of the Event Procedure

parametertype.name: MME_HANDOVER_TYPE
parametertype.description: Type of Handover

parametertype.name: RANDOM_ACCESS_TYPE
parametertype.description: Random Access Type

parametertype.name: TARGET_SELECTION_TYPE
parametertype.description: The type of selection for the handover target cell: blind (non measurement based, i.e. based on preconfigured information), or measurement based

parametertype.name: HO_ATTEMPT_CAUSE
parametertype.description: Handover attempt cause

parametertype.name: CAUSE_CODE
parametertype.description: This information element provides "Reason for failure" information. In order to get the protocol from where the Cause Code in an event originates, the parameter "L_CAUSE_PROT_TYPE" value should be analyzed.

parametertype.name: SUB_CAUSE_CODE
parametertype.description: This information element provides "Detailed reason for failure" information. This information should be analyzed together with the "Cause Code" parameter and the "L_CAUSE_PROT_TYPE" parameter.

parametertype.name: CAUSE_PROT_TYPE
parametertype.description: Protocol type of the failure cause

enumeration.enum: RIL3 (for causes where the same value can have different meaning between MM and SM)

parametertype.name: MTMSI
parametertype.description: M-Temporary Mobile Subscriber Identity

parametertype.name: VOL_TOTAL_UL
parametertype.description: M-Temporary Mobile Subscriber Identity

parametertype.name: MMEC
parametertype.description: MME Code

parametertype.name: ENBS1APID
parametertype.description: eNB S1 AP ID

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_MMES1APID
parametertype.description: MME S1 AP ID

parametertype.name: TAC
parametertype.description: Tracking Area Code. This element is used to uniquely identify a Tracking Area Code.

parametertype.name: HANDOVER_TYPE
parametertype.description: Type of Handover

parametertype.name: HANDOVER_BYTE_TYPE
parametertype.description: MME Code

parametertype.name: HANDOVER_RAT_CHANGE_TYPE
parametertype.description: RAT Change Type of Handover

parametertype.name: HANDOVER_SGW_CHANGE_TYPE
parametertype.description: SGW Change Type of Handover

parametertype.name: PROC_HO_PREP_OUT_ATTEMPT_CAUSE
parametertype.description: The cause of the procedure for HO Preparation

parametertype.name: PROC_HO_EXEC_OUT_ATTEMPT_CAUSE
parametertype.description: The cause of the procedure for HO Execution

parametertype.name: PROC_HO_PREP_OUT_RESULT
parametertype.description: The result of the HO Preparation Procedure

parametertype.name: PROC_HO_EXEC_OUT_RESULT
parametertype.description: The result of the HO Execution Procedure

parametertype.name: PROC_HO_PREP_IN_RESULT
parametertype.description: The result of the HO Preparation Procedure

parametertype.name: PROC_HO_EXEC_IN_RESULT
parametertype.description: The result of the HO Execution Procedure

parametertype.name: HO_PACKET_FORWARD
parametertype.description: Indicates if packet forward is used or not

parametertype.name: ENB_ID
parametertype.description: eNodeB ID

parametertype.name: RAC_UE_REF
parametertype.description: The UE identity used in service between RAC layer and Baseband.

parametertype.name: ENB_NAME
parametertype.description: eNodeB name

parametertype.name: GLOBAL_CELL_ID
parametertype.description: Identity of the cell, defined in MOM (eNB ID (20 bits) + Cell ID (8 bits) )
parametertype.comment: ECGI, E-UTRAN Cell Global Identifier. The eNB ID part will not be set in iteration 9.

parametertype.name: NAME_3
parametertype.description: Generic name

parametertype.name: NAME_32
parametertype.description: Generic name

parametertype.name: NAME_127
parametertype.description: Generic name

parametertype.name: NAME_128
parametertype.description: Generic name

parametertype.name: NAME_256
parametertype.description: Generic name

parametertype.name: PCI
parametertype.description: Physical Cell ID of the neighbor cell

parametertype.name: CGI
parametertype.description: Global Cell ID of the neighbor cell

parametertype.name: ENBS1APID
parametertype.description: eNB S1 AP ID

parametertype.name: MMES1APID
parametertype.description: MME S1 AP ID

parametertype.name: GUMMEI
parametertype.description: The GUMMEI of the released MME

parametertype.name: RSRP
parametertype.description: Reported RSRP of a cell

parametertype.name: RSRQ
parametertype.description: Reported RSRQ of a cell

parametertype.name: ERAB_BITMAP
parametertype.description: Bitmap pointing out UE ERAB Ids from the request. 0..15. (LSB) Bit position 0=ERAB Id 0, position 1=ERAB Id 1 etc. See X2 3GPP 36.423

parametertype.name: MCC
parametertype.description: Mobile Country Code. The MCC identifies uniquely the country of domicile of the mobile subscriber

parametertype.name: MNC
parametertype.description: Mobile Network Code. The MNC identifies the home PLMN of the mobile subscriber.

parametertype.name: ECI
parametertype.description: E-UTRAN Cell Identity. Used to identify cells within a PLMN.

parametertype.name: MMEGI
parametertype.description: MME Group ID.

parametertype.name: BEARER_ID
parametertype.description: The EPS Bearer ID identifies one of several bearers in a bearer setup list

parametertype.name: BEARER_QCI
parametertype.description: Provides information on a QoS class identifier for each bearer in a bearer setup list

parametertype.name: BEARER_CAUSE
parametertype.description: Provides information on "Reasons for failure" for each bearer in a bearer setup list

parametertype.name: IPV4
parametertype.description: IP address V4

parametertype.name: IPV6
parametertype.description: IP address V6

parametertype.name: LOG_MESSAGE
parametertype.description: A message indivating a log event

parametertype.name: MODEL
parametertype.description: UE MODEL

parametertype.name: VENDOR
parametertype.description: UE_VENDOR

parametertype.name: BEARERS_DEFAULT_BEARER_ID
parametertype.description: A message indivating a log event

parametertype.name: MME_PDN_INFO_DEFAULT_BEARER_ID
parametertype.description: A message indivating a log event

parametertype.name: PAGING_ATTEMPTS
parametertype.description: Counting the number of paging attempts. This information may be used for identify if a Service Request procedure is UE- or Network initiated.

parametertype.name: VOL_TOTAL_UL
parametertype.description: VOL_THP_UL + Number of bytes transmitted (PDCP level) in the last TTIs in the uplink.

parametertype.name: VOL_THP_UL
parametertype.description: Total DRB volume in UL for PDCP SDUs

parametertype.name: VOL_THP_DL
parametertype.description: Number of transmitted bytes (PDCP level) used for throughput calculation in the downlink (truncated with the last TTIs).

parametertype.name: VOL_TOTAL_UL
parametertype.description: VOL_THP_UL + Number of bytes transmitted (PDCP level) in the last TTIs in the uplink.

parametertype.name: VOL_TOTAL_DL
parametertype.description: VOL_THP_DL + Number of bytes transmitted (PDCP level) in the last TTIs in the downlink.

parametertype.name: TIME_THP_UL
parametertype.description: Number of ms used for the throughput calculation in uplink.

parametertype.name: TIME_THP_DL
parametertype.description: Number of ms used for the throughput calculation in downlink.

parametertype.name: THP_AVE_UL
parametertype.description: Average throughput in the uplink calculated over the session length.

parametertype.name: THP_AVE_DL
parametertype.description: Average throughput in the downlink calculated over the session length.

parametertype.name: THP_DETAILED_UL
parametertype.description: Set of 1.28 sec throughput samples in the uplink during the session length.

parametertype.name: THP_DETAILED_DL
parametertype.description: Set of 1.28 sec throughput samples in the downlink during the session length.

parametertype.name: SAMPLES_UL
parametertype.description: Number of 1.28 sec throughput data samples reported in the uplink (i.e., with non-zero data volume).

parametertype.name: SAMPLES_DL
parametertype.description: Number of 1.28 sec throughput data samples reported in the downlink (i.e., with non-zero data volume).

parametertype.name: LATENCY_DL
parametertype.description: DL latency measure. The time is between reception of a PDCP SDU untill the first succesful transmission of a MAC SDU have been transmitted.

parametertype.name: DL_RLC_DELAY
parametertype.description: Downlink delay measure in the RLC layer. One sample per RLC SDU sent to MAC. The time for each sample is between reception of a packet (PDCP SDU) until the packet is sent to the MAC layer entity for transmission on the air.

parametertype.name: DL_MAC_DELAY
parametertype.description: Downlink delay measure in the MAC layer. One sample per MAC SDU. The time for each sample is between reception of a packet RLC PDU until the packet is received by the UE or HARQ failure on this MAC SDU.

parametertype.name: DELAY_SAMPLES
parametertype.description: Number of samples to be used in delay measure calculations

parametertype.name: CQI_AVG
parametertype.description: Avg of CQIs reported by UE

parametertype.name: SCHED_RESTRICT_UE_CAT_UL
parametertype.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE of the number of ms where respective UE is limited in the DL direction by its UE capability.

parametertype.name: SCHED_RESTRICT_UE_CAT_DL
parametertype.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE of the number of ms where respective UE is limited in the UL direction by its UE capability.

parametertype.name: SCHED_ACTIVITY_UE_UL
parametertype.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE in the cell of the number of ms where SRB/DRB data has been scheduled in the UL.

parametertype.name: SCHED_ACTIVITY_UE_DL
parametertype.description: The sum of the contributions from each UE in the cell of the number of ms where SRB/DRB data has been scheduled in the DL.

parametertype.name: PACKET_TR_DL
parametertype.description: Number of PDCP SDUs transmitted DL.

parametertype.name: PACKET_REC_DL
parametertype.description: Number of PDCP SDUs received DL.

parametertype.name: PACKET_LOST_HO_DL
parametertype.description: Number of PDCP SDUs lost due to handover, DL.

parametertype.name: PACKET_LOST_PELR_DL
parametertype.description: Number of PDCP SDUs lost due to Traffic Management, DL.

parametertype.name: PACKET_REC_UL
parametertype.description: Number of PDCP SDUs received, UL.

parametertype.name: PACKET_LOST_UL
parametertype.description: Number of PDCP SDUs lost, UL.

parametertype.name: PACKET_LOST_PERL_UU_DL
parametertype.description: Number of PDCP SDUs lost, UL.

parametertype.name: RLC_ACK_DL
parametertype.description: The total number of successful RLC PDU transmissions (ACKs) in the downlink direction.

parametertype.name: RLC_NACK_DL
parametertype.description: The total number of unsuccessful RLC PDU and RLC PDU segment transmissions (NACKs) in the downlink direction.

parametertype.name: RLC_ACK_UL
parametertype.description: The total number of successful RLC PDU transmissions (ACKs) in the uplink direction.

parametertype.name: RLC_NACK_UL
parametertype.description: The total number of unsuccessful RLC PDU and RLC PDU segment transmissions (NACKs) in the uplink direction.

parametertype.name: HARQ_DL_ACK_QPSK
parametertype.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a QPSK modulation. Successful is based on the HARQ ACK from the UE.

parametertype.name: HARQ_DL_NACK_QPSK
parametertype.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a QPSK modulation. Failure is based on the HARQ NACK from the UE.

parametertype.name: HARQ_UL_SUCC_QPSK
parametertype.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions in the uplink direction using a QPSK modulation. Successful is based on the CRC check, not based on if RBS sends HARQ ACK (RBS can use the ACK even if the transport block was not successfully decoded in a way to control the HARQ)

parametertype.name: HARQ_UL_FAIL_QPSK
parametertype.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions in the uplink direction using a QPSK modulation. Failure is based on the CRC check (which will result in an NACK).

parametertype.name: HARQ_DL_ACK_16QAM
parametertype.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a 16QAM modulation. Successful is based on the HARQ ACK from the UE.

parametertype.name: HARQ_DL_NACK_16QAM
parametertype.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a 16QAM modulation. Failure is based on the HARQ NACK from the UE.

parametertype.name: HARQ_UL_SUCC_16QAM
parametertype.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions in the uplink direction using a 16QAM modulation. Successful is based on the CRC check, not based on if RBS sends HARQ ACK (RBS can use the ACK even if the transport block was not successfully decoded in a way to control the HARQ)

parametertype.name: HARQ_UL_FAIL_16QAM
parametertype.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions in the uplink direction using a 16QAM modulation. Failure is based on the CRC check (which will result in an NACK).

parametertype.name: HARQ_DL_ACK_64QAM
parametertype.description: The total number of successful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a 64QAM modulation. Successful is based on the HARQ ACK from the UE.

parametertype.name: HARQ_DL_NACK_64QAM
parametertype.description: The total number of unsuccessful HARQ transmissions in the downlink direction using a 64QAM modulation. Failure is based on the HARQ NACK from the UE.

parametertype.name: MAC_DTX_UL_QPSK
parametertype.description: The total number of occasions when an uplink grant was meant for HARQ transmission in the uplink direction with QPSK, where DTX is considered the reason for no reception of HARQ in uplink in the eNB.

parametertype.name: MAC_DTX_DL_QPSK
parametertype.description: The total number of occasions when an downlink HARQ feedback was not received from an UE for a Transport Block with QPSK and DTX is considered the reason.

parametertype.name: MAC_DTX_DL_16QAM
parametertype.description: The total number of occasions when an uplink grant was meant for HARQ transmission in the uplink direction with 16QAM, where DTX is considered the reason for no reception of HARQ in uplink in the eNB.

parametertype.name: MAC_DTX_UL_16QAM
parametertype.description: The total number of occasions when an downlink HARQ feedback was not received from an UE for a Transport Block with 16QAM and DTX is considered the reason.

parametertype.name: MAC_DTX_DL_64QAM
parametertype.description: The total number of occasions when an uplink grant was meant for HARQ transmission in the uplink direction with 64QAM where DTX is considered the reason for no reception of HARQ in uplink in the eNB.

parametertype.name: RADIOTHP_VOL_DL
parametertype.description: The total successfully transferred data volume on MAC level in the downlink. This counter includes possible padding bits.

parametertype.name: RADIOTHP_RES_DL
parametertype.description: The total amount of physical resources used for transmission in the downlink. Both successful and unsuccessful transmissions are counted.

parametertype.name: RADIO_VOL_UL
parametertype.description: The total successfully transferred data volume on MAC level in the uplink. This counter includes possible padding bits.

parametertype.name: RADIOTHP_RES_UL
parametertype.description: The total amount of physical resources used for transmission in the uplink. Both successful and unsuccessful transmissions are counted.

parametertype.name: CQI_MED
parametertype.description: Set of CQI median values during the session length.

parametertype.name: CH_RANK_REP
parametertype.description: Number of instances of channel rank=1,2 reported (in spatial multiplexing mode), sum of the corresponding 1.28 sec counters over the session length.

parametertype.name: TX_MODE
parametertype.description: Number of instances of tx mode=0,1,2,3,4 used, sum of the corresponding 1.28 sec counters over the session length.

parametertype.name: RADIOTHP_RES_UL
parametertype.description: Number of instances of tx mode=0,1,2,3,4 used, sum of the corresponding 1.28 sec counters over the session length.

parametertype.name: POWER_RESTRICT
parametertype.description: The number of Transport Blocks on MAC level scheduled in uplink where the UE was considered to be power limited.

parametertype.name: POWER_NO_RESTRICT
parametertype.description: The number of Transport Blocks on MAC level scheduled in uplink where the UE was NOT considered to be power limited.

parametertype.name: RSRP_AVG
parametertype.description: Average of RSRP measurements during the aggregation period.

parametertype.name: RSRQ_AVG
parametertype.description: Average of RSRQ measurements during the aggregation period.

parametertype.name: RSRP_DETAILED
parametertype.description: List of RSRP measurements during the aggregation period.

parametertype.name: EVENT_TIME_REL
parametertype.description: List of RSRP measurements during the aggregation period.

parametertype.name: RSRQ_DETAILED
parametertype.description: List of RSRQ measurements during the aggregation period.

parametertype.name: NUM_BEARERS
parametertype.description: number of radio bearers

parametertype.name: RB_BYTE_TYPE
parametertype.description: bearer type

parametertype.name: RB
parametertype.description: bearer info

parametertype.name: PER_RB
parametertype.description: Radio Bearer info

parametertype.name: PDCP_ACKVOL_DL_PER_RB
parametertype.description: bearer info

parametertype.name: PDCP_TRANSVOL_DL_PER_RB
parametertype.description: bearer info

parametertype.name: PDCP_RECVOL_UL_PER_RB
parametertype.description: bearer info

parametertype.name: LATENCY_DL_PER_RB
parametertype.description: Radio Bearer info

parametertype.name: RLC_DELAY_DL_PER_RB
parametertype.description: Radio Bearer info

parametertype.name: LATENCY_DL_SAMPLES_PER_RB
parametertype.description: bearer info

parametertype.name: RLC_DELAY_DL_SAMPLES_PER_RB
parametertype.description: bearer info

parametertype.name: UE_MEAS_TS
parametertype.description: List of timestamps of the RSRP/RSRQ measurements.

parametertype.name: TIMESTAMP_MINUTE
parametertype.description: time in minutes

parametertype.name: APN
parametertype.description: Access Point Name

parametertype.name: DATA_RECV
parametertype.description: DATA received

parametertype.name: DIR
parametertype.description: time in minutes

parametertype.name: RELEASE_CAUSE
parametertype.description: Release cause

parametertype.name: TRIGGERING_NODE
parametertype.description: Triggering node

parametertype.name: DETACH_TRIGGER
parametertype.description: Origin of Detach initiation

parametertype.name: DETACH_TYPE
parametertype.description: EPS Detach Type

parametertype.name: DECONNECT_PDN_TYPE
parametertype.description: PDN Deconnection type

parametertype.name: UE_RELEASE_CLAUSE_TYPE
parametertype.description: Release cause

parametertype.name: TRIGGERING_NODE_TYPE
parametertype.description: Triggering node

parametertype.name: ATTACH_TYPE
parametertype.description: UE Attch type

parametertype.name: SCANNER_ID
parametertype.description: 16 scanners for UE Trace and 6 scanners for Cell Trace. The scanner ID consists of a sequence of 22 bits, each bit corresponds to a particular scanner ID. See "File Format Description" 1/198 18-HRB 105 500
parametertype.comment: 16 scanners for UE Trace and 6 scanners for Cell Trace. The scanner ID field is consists of sequence of 22 bits, each bit corresponding to a particular scanner ID. See Ref [1] for an enhanced description.

parametertype.name: TEID
parametertype.description: Tunnel Endpoint Identifier
parametertype.comment: From 3GPP TS 29.060 (GTP V1) and 3GPP TS 29.274 (GTP V2)

parametertype.name: SESSION_DURATION
parametertype.description: The duration of a session in seconds

parametertype.name: IPV4
parametertype.description: IP address V4

parametertype.name: IPV4STRING
parametertype.description: IP address V4

parametertype.name: PORT
parametertype.description: A TCP or UDP port

parametertype.name: TRANSMISSION_DIRECTION
parametertype.description: The direction in which a packet was travelling

parametertype.name: TOTAL_DATA_BYTES
parametertype.description: Total number of bytes transmitted in a session

parametertype.name: DATA_BYTES
parametertype.description: The amount of bytes transmitted

parametertype.name: PACKETS
parametertype.description: The amount of packets transmitted

parametertype.name: THROUGHPUT
parametertype.description: Throughput values are always expressed as Kbits/Second long values, even if they are specified as being in Mbits/Second in the S-KPI definition documents.

parametertype.name: ALONE_RATIO
parametertype.description: The ratio of the traffic on this session to the total traffic

parametertype.name: RWIN_SIZE
parametertype.description: Receiver window size [bytes]

parametertype.name: ROUND_TRIP_TIME
parametertype.description: Partial RTT upon connection setup (-1 if not measured [SYN or SYN ACK is retransmitted]) [s]

parametertype.name: PACKET_SIZE
parametertype.description: IP data packet size [bytes]

parametertype.name: PACKET_LOSS_RATIO
parametertype.description: The ratio of packets lost to the total packets carried

parametertype.name: CONTENT_TYPE
parametertype.description: The type of content being carried in the session

parametertype.name: HOST
parametertype.description: The network host with which this session is being carried out

parametertype.name: URI
parametertype.description: The URI of the network host with which this session is being carried out

parametertype.name: REBUFFERING_TIME
parametertype.description: An amount of time spent with rebuffering during a FLV stream

parametertype.name: REBUFFERING_NUM
parametertype.description: The total number of rebuffering events during the FLV stream

parametertype.name: TERMINATION_CAUSE
parametertype.description: The reason this session terminated

parametertype.name: CODEC
parametertype.description: The type of codec used on this session

parametertype.name: AUDIO_RATE
parametertype.description: The audio rate in KHz

parametertype.name: AUDIO_TYPE
parametertype.description: The type of audio used on this session

parametertype.name: QOE_NUM
parametertype.description: The number of QoE measurements in a session

parametertype.name: QOE
parametertype.description: The estimated QoE value on this session

parametertype.name: QOE_TIME
parametertype.description: The relative start time in a session for which a QoE value was calculated

parametertype.name: QOE_DURATION
parametertype.description: The duration in a session for which a QoE value was calculated

parametertype.name: QOE_SEQUENCE_NUM
parametertype.description: The sequence number of a QoE measurement in a session

parametertype.name: RAT
parametertype.description: Radio Access Type, either GSM, WCDMA or LTE

parametertype.name: PROTOCOL
parametertype.description: The type of protocol detected on a sesison

parametertype.name: FUNCTION
parametertype.description: The type of function detected on a sesison

parametertype.name: ENCAPSULATION
parametertype.description: The type of encapsulation detected on a sesison

parametertype.name: ENCRYPTION
parametertype.description: The type of encryption detected on a sesison

parametertype.name: ENCRYPTION
parametertype.description: The type of encryption detected on a sesison

parametertype.name: SERVICE_PROVIDER
parametertype.description: The service provider detected on a sesison

parametertype.name: CLIENT
parametertype.description: The type of client detected on a sesison

parametertype.name: MCC
parametertype.description: Mobile Country Code. The MCC identifies uniquely the country of domicile of the mobile subscriber

parametertype.name: MNC
parametertype.description: Mobile Network Code. The MNC identifies the home PLMN of the mobile subscriber.

parametertype.name: LAC
parametertype.description: Location Area Code

parametertype.name: RAC
parametertype.description: Routing Area Code

parametertype.name: CI
parametertype.description: Cell Identity

parametertype.name: SAC
parametertype.description: Service Area Code

parametertype.name: RNC_ID
parametertype.description: RNC identity used in the radio network

parametertype.name: RNC
parametertype.description: The RNC ID

parametertype.name: RBS
parametertype.description: The RBS ID

parametertype.name: DOUBLE_TYPE
parametertype.description: Total DRB volume in UL for PDCP SDUs

parametertype.name: TRANSFERRED_PDP
parametertype.description: Number of transferred PDP Contexts

parametertype.name: FLOAT_TYPE
parametertype.description: float type data

parametertype.name: DROPPED_PDP
parametertype.description: Number of dropped PDP Contexts

parametertype.name: NSAPI
parametertype.description: Network Service Access Point Identifier

parametertype.name: TEXT
parametertype.description: The name of an event used in a correlation

parametertype.name: LATITUDE
parametertype.description: The Latitude Value

parametertype.name: LONGITUDE
parametertype.description: The Longitude Value

parametertype.name: BEAM_DIRECTION
parametertype.description: The Beam Direction Value

parametertype.name: SCRAMBLING_CODE
parametertype.description: The primaryScramblingCode

parametertype.name: CELL_RANGE
parametertype.description: The Cell Range

parametertype.name: ATTACH_TYPE
parametertype.description: GPRS attach type, either GPRS attach, GPRS attach while IMSI is attached, or Combined GPRS IMSI attach

parametertype.name: PTMSI
parametertype.description: Packet-Temporary Mobile Subscriber Identity

parametertype.name: HLR
parametertype.description: Home Location Register address
parametertype.detaileddescription: 9 octets, TBCD (Telephony Binary Coded Decimal) NULL-padding (x00) for unused characters upto a total length of 18 octets. No HLR is indicated with (xFF).

parametertype.name: DECODED_CAUSE_CODE
parametertype.description: Decoded text value of the cause code

parametertype.name: MSISDN
parametertype.description: Mobile Subscriber Integrated Services Digital Network Number

parametertype.name: ENUM_STRING
parametertype.description: String value for Enum member

parametertype.name: RAU_TYPE
parametertype.description: The type if Routing Area Update

parametertype.name: WEB_ACCESSIBILITY
parametertype.description: This details the precentage of web pages which were accessed successfully: Num Successful Web Access/Num Web Access attempts

parametertype.name: WEB_RETAINABILITY
parametertype.description: This details the precentage of web pages which were fully downloaded once accessed: Num Successful Data Transfers/Num Started Data Transferred

parametertype.name: WEB_INTEGRITY_ACCESS_TIME
parametertype.description: The WEB Integrity Access Time. The time period needed to establish a TCP/IP connection to the service: AccessTime/Num Sessions

parametertype.name: PDN_CAUSE
parametertype.description: The PDN Cause

parametertype.name: ERAB_DATA_LOST
parametertype.description: ERAB release result

parametertype.name: ERAB_RELEASE_REQ_QCI
parametertype.description: QoS class identifier, see 3GPP TS 23.203

parametertype.name: ERAB_SETUP_REQ_ARP
parametertype.description: Allocation and Retention Priority Level, see 3GPP 23.203

parametertype.name: ERAB_SETUP_REQ_PCI
parametertype.description: Allocation and Retention Pre-emption Capability Indicator, see 3GPP 23.203

parametertype.name: ERAB_SETUP_REQ_PVI
parametertype.description: Allocation and Retention Pre-emption Vulnerability Indicator, see 3GPP 23.203

parametertype.name: HO_OUT_EXEC_ERAB_FAIL_AND_DATA_LOST
parametertype.description: ERAB release result

parametertype.name: HO_OUT_PREP_ERAB_FAIL
parametertype.description: ERAB release result

parametertype.name: HO_OUT_PREP_ERAB_FAIL_AND_DATA_LOST
parametertype.description: ERAB release result

parametertype.name: P_3GPP_CAUSE
parametertype.description: This parameter holds any possible Cause value described in the S1AP 3GPP specification, Section 9.2.1.3 in TS 36.413 or in the X2AP 3GPP specification, Section 9.2.6 in TS 36.423. Needs to be used jointly with EVENT_PARAM_3GPP_CAUSE_GROUP
parametertype.comment: Selects the value of the enumerated elements in S1AP 3GPP specification, Section 9.2.1.3 in TS 36.413 or in the X2AP 3GPP specification, Section 9.2.6 in TS 36.423 where the first vale is 0, etc

parametertype.name: P_3GPP_CAUSE_GROUP
parametertype.description: This parameter holds all Cause-Group values that are described in the S1AP 3GPP specification, Section 9.2.1.3 in TS 36.413 or in the X2AP 3GPP specification, Section 9.2.6 in TS 36.423. Needs to be used jointly with EVENT_PARAM_3GPP_CAUSE

parametertype.name: MEAS_ID_BITMAP
parametertype.description: Pointing out measurement identities of started UE measurements. Position 1 in the bitmap (LSB) corresponds to measurement identity 1 and so on.
parametertype.comment: Bitmap pointing out new started UE Measurements ID

parametertype.name: MOBILITY_DECISION
parametertype.description: Indicates the decision the mobility evaluation has taken.

parametertype.name: MOBILITY_TRIGGER
parametertype.description: Indicates the trigger for performing a mobility evaluation.

parametertype.name: NEIGHBOR_RSRP
parametertype.description: Reported RSRP of the neighbor cell

parametertype.name: NEIGHBOR_RSRQ
parametertype.description: Reported RSRQ of the neighbor cell

parametertype.name: PDCP_SRB_ACKVOL_DL
parametertype.description: The total volume (PDCP SDU) on Data Radio Bearers that has been transmitted and acknowledged in the downlink direction.

parametertype.name: PDCP_SRB_RECVOL_UL
parametertype.description: Total SRB volume in UL for PDCP SDUs

parametertype.name: PDCP_SRB_TRANSVOL_DL
parametertype.description: Total SRB volume that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer.

parametertype.name: REDIRECT_RELEASE_INFO
parametertype.description: Information about what technology the RRC release will redirect the UE to

parametertype.name: RELEASE_WITH_REDIRECT_REASON
parametertype.description: If the mobility decision is Release with Redirect, this parameter indicates the reason. Otherwise, unavailable.

parametertype.name: SPID
parametertype.description: Subscriber Profile ID

parametertype.name: TA
parametertype.description: Time Alignment. (See N_TA in 3GPP 36.211, 213, 320)

parametertype.name: TRIGGERING_MEAS_ID
parametertype.description: If mobility trigger indicates any of the incoming measurement report types, this parameter indicates the measurement identity of that UE measurement. Otherwise, unavailable.

parametertype.name: INTERNAL_RELEASE_CAUSE
parametertype.description: Ericsson Internal UE or ERAB release cause. Used to give additional information over and above the S1 Release Cause (External).

parametertype.name: UE_DL_MAC_DELAY
parametertype.description: Aggregated time for the downlink delay measure in the MAC layer. One sample per MAC SDU. The time for each sample is between reception of a packet RLC PDU until the packet is received by the UE or HARQ failure on this MAC SDU. Only the Primary Component Carrier traffic contribution (aka PCell) is included.
parametertype.comment: Primary Component Carrier (aka PCell) contribution only.

parametertype.name: RATE_SHAPE_TIME_UL
parametertype.description: The time where the UE have uplink data in a buffer and rate shaping functionality will prohibit transmission in the uplink. Measured on UE level.

parametertype.name: THP_DL_DRB
parametertype.description: UE throughput calculated for the DL.

parametertype.name: THP_PDCPVOL_TRUNK_DL
parametertype.description: The DL PDCP volume is from the last TTI when a buffer is emptied. Measured on UE level.

parametertype.name: THP_PDCPVOL_TRUNK_UL
parametertype.description: The UL volume used for UL UE Throughput. It comprises of the MAC SDU volume received on Uu, excluding the volume received in the first 4 data receptions of an UL buffer transfer and the TTI emptying the UL buffer.

parametertype.name: THP_TIME_DL
parametertype.description: The time from when data was first transmitted on Uu until DL buffer is emptied.The last TTIwhen abuffer is emptiedis excluded. Measured on UE level.

parametertype.name: THP_TIME_UL
parametertype.description: The effective UL transport time comprises those periods from when the first part of the PDCP SDU of the UL buffer was received on Uu until the buffer is emptied, excluding the TTI emptying the buffer.

parametertype.name: THP_UL_DRB
parametertype.description: UE throughput calculated for the UL.

parametertype.name: S1_RELEASE_CAUSE
parametertype.description: Sub-set of 3gpp causes on S1 interface that result in a UE Context or ERAB Release. See 3gpp 36.413 This S1 interface parameter can indicate some X2 failures. It is an MME cause or ENB cause depending on Triggering Node.

parametertype.name: SERVING_RSRP
parametertype.description: Reported RSRP of the serving cell

parametertype.name: SERVING_RSRQ
parametertype.description: Reported RSRQ of the serving cell

parametertype.name: TRIGGERING_NODE
parametertype.description: Triggering node

parametertype.name: NOISEINTERF_MEA
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power.

parametertype.name: PER_DRB_DL_RLC_DELAY
parametertype.description: Aggregated time for the downlink delay measure in the RLC layer. One sample per RLC SDU sent to MAC. The time for each sample is between reception of a packet (PDCP SDU) until the packet is sent to the MAC layer entity for transmission on the air.

parametertype.name: PER_DRB_DL_RLC_DELAY_SAMPL
parametertype.description: Number of samples to be usedin DL MAC delay measure calculations

parametertype.name: PER_DRB_LAT_TIME_DL
parametertype.description: Aggregated time samples for the DL latency measure. The time is between reception of a PDCP SDU untill the first succesful transmission of a MAC SDU have been transmitted

parametertype.name: PER_DRB_LAT_SAMPL_DL
parametertype.description: Number of samples to be usedin DL latency measure calculations

parametertype.name: PER_DRB_PACKET_DISC_AQM_DL
parametertype.description: Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) for which no part has been transmitted over the air in the downlink direction that are discarded due to AQM.
parametertype.comment: Calculated from 20 discards per 100 us over 1.28 s, but if that happens then we are not interested in exact numbers, so 2 bytes might be as good. ceil(log2(20/100e-6*1.28)/8)

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_0
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with N+I <= -121

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_1
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -121 < N+I <= -120

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_10
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -112 < N+I <= -108

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_11
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -108 < N+I <= -104

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_12
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -104 < N+I <= -100

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_13
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -100 < N+I <= -96

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_14
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -96 < N+I <= -92

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_15
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -92 < N+I

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_2
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -120 < N+I <= -119

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_3
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -119 < N+I <= -118

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_4
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -118 < N+I <= -117

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_5
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -117 < N+I <= -116

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_6
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -116 < N+I <= -115

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_7
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -115 < N+I <= -114

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_8
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -114< N+I <= -113

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_9
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power with, -113 < N+I <= -112

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_PUCCH_0
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power on PUCCH with N+I <= -121

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_PUCCH_1
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power on PUCCH with, -121 < N+I <= -120

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_PUCCH_10
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power on PUCCH with, -112 < N+I <= -108

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_PUCCH_11
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power on PUCCH with, -108 < N+I <= -104

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_PUCCH_12
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power on PUCCH with, -104 < N+I <= -100

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_PUCCH_13
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power on PUCCH with, -100 < N+I <= -96

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_PUCCH_14
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power on PUCCH with, -96 < N+I <= -92

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_NOISEINTERF_MEAS_PUCCH_15
parametertype.description: Number of samples for the measured Noise and Interference Power on PUCCH with, -92 < N+I

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_RANK_TX_0
parametertype.description: Samples with RANK=1 and TX=2 used towards an UE
parametertype.comment: TX=2 => Transmit Diversity, explanation of RANK and TX in 3GPP 36.213

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_RANK_TX_1
parametertype.description: Samples with RANK=1 and TX=3 used towards an UE
parametertype.comment: TX=3 => Open Loop Spatial Multiplexing, explanation of RANK and TX in 3GPP 36.213

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_RANK_TX_2
parametertype.description: Samples with RANK=2 and TX=3 used towards an UE
parametertype.comment: TX=3 => Open Loop Spatial Multiplexing, explanation of RANK and TX in 3GPP 36.213

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_RANK_TX_3
parametertype.description: Samples with RANK=1 and TX=4 used towards an UE
parametertype.comment: TX=4 => Closed Loop Spatial Multiplexing, explanation of RANK and TX in 3GPP 36.213

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_RANK_TX_4
parametertype.description: Samples with RANK=2 and TX=4 used towards an UE
parametertype.comment: TX=4 => Closed Loop Spatial Multiplexing, explanation of RANK and TX in 3GPP 36.213

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_0
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=0 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_1
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=1 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_10
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=10 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_11
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=11 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_12
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=12 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_13
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=13 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_14
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=14 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_15
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=15 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_2
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=2 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_3
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=3 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_4
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=4 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_5
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=5 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_6
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=6 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_7
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=7 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_8
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=8 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_CQI_REPORTED_9
parametertype.description: Samples with CQI=9 reported by UE

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_RANK_REPORTED_0
parametertype.description: Samples with RANK=1 reported by UE in Open and Closed Loop Spatial Multiplexing

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_RANK_REPORTED_1
parametertype.description: Samples with RANK=2 reported by UE in Open and Closed Loop Spatial Multiplexing

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_ERAB_ID
parametertype.description: E-RAB Id as defined in 3GPP TS 36413-840

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_BEARER_TYPE
parametertype.description: The type of the bearer: Signaling Radio Bearer (SRB) or Data Radio Bearer (DRB)

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_PER_DRB_PDCP_ACKVOL_DL
parametertype.description: The volume (PDCP SDU) on DRB that has been transmitted and acknowledged in the downlink direction.

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_PER_DRB_PDCP_RECVOL_UL
parametertype.description: DRB volume in UL for PDCP SDUs

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_PER_DRB_PDCP_TRANSVOL_DL
parametertype.description: DRB volume that has been transmitted in the downlink direction in the PDCP layer.

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_PER_DRB_DL_RLC_DELAY
parametertype.description: Aggregated time for the downlink delay measure in the RLC layer. One sample per RLC SDU sent to MAC. The time for each sample is between reception of a packet (PDCP SDU) until the packet is sent to the MAC layer entity for transmission on the air.

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_PER_DRB_DL_RLC_DELAY_SAMPL
parametertype.description: Number of samples to be usedin DL MAC delay measure calculations

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_PER_DRB_LAT_TIME_DL
parametertype.description: Aggregated time samples for the DL latency measure. The time is between reception of a PDCP SDU untill the first succesful transmission of a MAC SDU have been transmitted

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_PER_DRB_LAT_SAMPL_DL
parametertype.description: Number of samples to be usedin DL latency measure calculations

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_BEARER_TYPE
parametertype.description: The type of the bearer: Signaling Radio Bearer (SRB) or Data Radio Bearer (DRB)

parametertype.name: EVENT_PARAM_PER_DRB_PACKET_DISC_AQM_DL
parametertype.description: Total number of packets (PDCP SDUs) for which no part has been transmitted over the air in the downlink direction that are discarded due to AQM.
parametertype.comment: Calculated from 20 discards per 100 us over 1.28 s, but if that happens then we are not interested in exact numbers, so 2 bytes might be as good. ceil(log2(20/100e-6*1.28)/8)

parametertype.name: HO_TYPE
parametertype.description: Indicate the type of handover

parametertype.name: HO_RANDOM_ACCESS_TYPE
parametertype.description: Random Access Type

parametertype.name: INITIAL_UE_IDENTITY
parametertype.description: The identity of the UE received in RRC Connection Request

parametertype.name: INITIAL_UE_IDENTITY_TYPE
parametertype.description: Type of identifier used by UE in RRC Connection Request

parametertype.name: RRC_ESTABL_CAUSE
parametertype.description: The establishment cause received in RRC Connection request

parametertype.name: RRC_RESULT
parametertype.description: RRC result

parametertype.name: S1_SIG_CONN_RESULT
parametertype.description: S1 Connection result

parametertype.name: INITIAL_CTXT_RESULT
parametertype.description: Initial Context result

parametertype.name: SERVING_PLMN_ID
parametertype.description: The serving PLMNid which is received from HRL (Handover Restriction List) via S1 and X2. See 3GPP 36.413, 36.423 for value range.
parametertype.comment:
- digits 0 to 9, encoded 0000 to 1001, - 1111 used as filler digit, two digits per octet, - bits 4 to 1 of octet n encoding digit 2n-1 - bits 8 to 5 of octet n encoding digit 2n
-The Selected PLMN identity consists of 3 digits from MCC followed by either -a filler digit plus 2 digits from MNC (in case of 2 digit MNC) or -3 digits from MNC (in case of a 3 digit MNC).

parametertype.name: MME_HO_TYPE
parametertype.description: MME Handover type

parametertype.name: MME_SERVICE_REQUEST_TYPE
parametertype.description: MME Service Request Type

parametertype.name: MME_SERVICE_REQUEST_CS_FALLBACK_SERVICE_TYPE
parametertype.description: MME Service Request fallback service type

parametertype.name: MME_SERVICE_REQUEST_TRIGGER
parametertype.description: MME Service Request Trigger

parametertype.name: MME_TAU_TYPE
parametertype.description: MME TAU type

parametertype.name: MME_HO_NODE_ROLE
parametertype.description: Node role in the handover

parametertype.name: MME_HO_RAT_CHANGE_TYPE
parametertype.description: RAT Change Type of Handover

parametertype.name: MME_HO_SGW_CHANGE_TYPE
parametertype.description: SGW Change Type of Handover

parametertype.name: EPC_EVENT_RESULT
parametertype.description: Result of the Event Procedure

parametertype.name: SGW_DURATION
parametertype.description: Duration provides timing information with millisecond granularity for the signaling procedure.
parametertype.detaileddescription: Calculated from when the signaling procedure starts (i.e. the first request is received/sent) until the signaling procedure ends (i.e. the first accept or reject response is sent/received). If the duration of the event exceeds 65535 ms the value of the DURATION parameter will start counting from 0 again.

parametertype.name: SGW_CAUSE_PROTOCOL
parametertype.description: This information element indicates from which protocol the cause code originates
parametertype.detaileddescription: Only GPTV2 and INTERNAL are used in the current release. INTERNAL causes codes are used when no external signalling is involved.

parametertype.name: SGW_CAUSE_CODE
parametertype.description: This information element provides information about the reason for acceptance or rejection of an operation. In order to get the protocol from where the Cause Code in an event originates, the parameter "SGW_CAUSE_PROTOCOL" value should be analyzed.

parametertype.name: SGW_SUB_CAUSE_CODE
parametertype.description: This information element provides "Detailed reason for failure" information. This information should be analyzed together with the "SGW_CAUSE_CODE" parameter and the "SGW_CAUSE_PROTOCOL" parameter.

parametertype.name: EVENT_TRIGGER
parametertype.description: Indicates the reason why the event was triggered.

parametertype.name: ORIGINATING_NODE
parametertype.description: The value represents the node type that initiated the event.
parametertype.detaileddescription: SELF is used for events initiated by the CPG node itself.

parametertype.name: APN_AMBR_UL
parametertype.description: Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate (kbps) in uplink direction
parametertype.detaileddescription: Defined in TS 29.274, chapter 8.7 and TS 24.301, chapter 9.9.4.2.

parametertype.name: APN_AMBR_DL
parametertype.description: Aggregate Maximum Bit Rate (kbps) in downlink direction
parametertype.detaileddescription: Defined in TS 29.274, chapter 8.7 and TS 24.301, chapter 9.9.4.2.

parametertype.name: ERAB_RELEASE_RESULT
parametertype.description: ERAB release result

parametertype.name: ERAB_RELEASE_REQ_BITMAP
parametertype.description: Bitmap pointing out UE ERAB Ids in the release request. 0..15. (LSB) Bit position 0=ERAB Id 0, position 1=ERAB Id 1 etc. See X2 3GPP 36.423

parametertype.name: ERAB_RELEASE_REQ
parametertype.description: Number of ERABs in the release request.

parametertype.name: ERAB_RELEASE_SUCC_BITMAP
parametertype.description: Bitmap pointing out UE ERAB Ids that was released. 0..15. (LSB) Bit position 0=ERAB Id 0, position 1=ERAB Id 1 etc. See X2 3GPP 36.423

parametertype.name: ERAB_SETUP_SUCC_BITMAP
parametertype.description: Bitmap pointing out UE ERAB Ids that was released. 0..15. (LSB) Bit position 0=ERAB Id 0, position 1=ERAB Id 1 etc. See X2 3GPP 36.423

parametertype.name: ERAB_DATA_LOST_BITMAP
parametertype.description: Bitmap pointing out UE ERAB Ids that had data in UL/DL DRB buffers at the release. 0..15. (LSB) Bit position 0=ERAB Id 0, position 1=ERAB Id 1 etc. See X2 3GPP 36.423

parametertype.name: HO_OUT_PREP_ERAB_FAIL_BITMAP
parametertype.description: Bitmap pointing out UE ERAB Ids that failed to be prepared in target cell. 0..15. (LSB) Bit position 0=ERAB Id 0, position 1=ERAB Id 1 etc. See X2 3GPP 36.423

parametertype.name: MME_DURATION
parametertype.description: Duration provides timing information with millisecond granularity calculated from when the signaling procedure starts until it ends for the event.

parametertype.name: L_ATTACH_TYPE
parametertype.description: EPS attach type, either EPS attach, Combined EPS IMSI attach or EPS emergency attach.

parametertype.name: L_CAUSE_PROT_TYPE
parametertype.description: This information element indicates from which protocol the cause code originates

parametertype.name: REQUEST_RETRIES
parametertype.description: Number of retry messages that are initiated by the UE

parametertype.name: SMS_ONLY
parametertype.description: When included, indicates that UE requested a combined TAU for EPS services and SMS Only

parametertype.name: L_DETACH_TRIGGER
parametertype.description: EPS Detach Trigger. The value represents the initiated origin for detach.

parametertype.name: L_DETACH_TYPE
parametertype.description: EPS Detach Type

parametertype.name: PDN_CONNECT_REQUEST_TYPE
parametertype.description: Request type according to 3GPP 24.008.

enumeration.enum: UE request new connectivity to a PDN
UE request new connectivity to a PDN providing emergency bearer services

parametertype.name: GTP_PIGGYBACKED
parametertype.description: Indicates if the dedicated bearer activation was done in parallel with the default bearer activation as a result of a piggybacked Create Bearer Request or not

parametertype.name: L_DEACTIVATION_TRIGGER
parametertype.description: EPS Deactivation Trigger

parametertype.name: ERAB_RELEASE_REQ_QCI_INT
parametertype.description: QoS class identifier, see 3GPP TS 23.203

parametertype.name: ERAB_SETUP_REQ_ARP_BYTE
parametertype.description: Allocation and Retention Priority Level, see 3GPP 23.203

parametertype.name: ERAB_SETUP_REQ_PCI_BYTE
parametertype.description: Allocation and Retention Pre-emption Capability Indicator, see 3GPP 23.203

parametertype.name: ERAB_SETUP_REQ_PVI_BYTE
parametertype.description: Allocation and Retention Pre-emption Vulnerability Indicator, see 3GPP 23.203

parametertype.name: HO_OUT_PREP_ERAB_FAIL_AND_DATA_LOST_BYTE
parametertype.description: ERAB release result

parametertype.name: HO_OUT_EXEC_ERAB_FAIL_AND_DATA_LOST_BYTE
parametertype.description: ERAB release result

parametertype.name: ERAB_SETUP_RESULT
parametertype.description: ERAB setup result for all ERABs in the request

parametertype.name: ERAB_QCI
parametertype.description: QoS class identifier, see 3GPP TS 23.203

parametertype.name: ERAB_ARP
parametertype.description: Allocation and Retention Priority Level, see 3GPP 23.203

parametertype.name: ERAB_SETUP_ATT_ACC_TYPE
parametertype.description: The access type that triggered the ERAB setup

parametertype.name: ERAB_SETUP_SUCC_ACC_TYPE
parametertype.description: The access type that triggered the ERAB setup

parametertype.name: ERAB_ID_SETUP_REQ
parametertype.description: The element value is set to 1 if the corresponding E-RAB Id was included in the request.
parametertype.comment: The framework will set it to UNAVAILABLE for any elements not set (ie. elements left as INVALID).

parametertype.name: ARP_PRIORITY_LEVEL
parametertype.description: Provides information on Priority Level of Allocation and Retention Priority for each bearer in a bearer setup list

parametertype.name: ARP_PCI
parametertype.description: Provides information on Pre-emption-Capability of Allocation and Retention Priority for each bearer in a bearer setup list

parametertype.name: ARP_PVI
parametertype.description: Provides information on Pre-emption-Vulnerability of Allocation and Retention Priority for each bearer in a bearer setup list

parametertype.name: GBR_UPLINK
parametertype.description: Provides Guaranteed Bit Rate Uplink (kbps) for each GBR bearer in a bearer setup list

parametertype.name: GBR_DOWNLINK
parametertype.description: Provides Guaranteed Bit Rate Downlink (kbps) for each GBR bearer in a bearer setup list

parametertype.name: BEARER_SENT_DL_PACKETS
parametertype.description: Indicates how many packets that have been sent by the SGW in downlink direction for the bearer.

parametertype.name: BEARER_SENT_DL_BYTES
parametertype.description: Indicates how many bytes that have been sent by the SGW in downlink direction for the bearer.

parametertype.name: BEARER_RCVD_UL_PACKETS
parametertype.description: Indicates how many packets that have been received by the SGW in uplink direction for the bearer.

parametertype.name: BEARER_RCVD_UL_BYTES
parametertype.description: Indicates how many bytes that have been received by the SGW in uplink direction for the bearer.

parametertype.name: BEARER_DROPPED_DL_PACKETS
parametertype.description: Indicates how many packets in downlink direction that have been lost for the bearer.

parametertype.name: BEARER_DROPPED_UL_PACKETS
parametertype.description: Indicates how many packets in uplink direction that have been lost for the bearer.

parametertype.name: BEARER_MBR_UL
parametertype.description: Provides Maximum Bit Rate (kbps) in uplink direction for a GBR bearer
parametertype.detaileddescription: Defined in TS 29.274, chapter 8.15 and TS 36.413, chapter 9.2.1.18-19.

parametertype.name: BEARER_MBR_DL
parametertype.description: Provides Maximum Bit Rate (kbps) in downlink direction for a GBR bearer
parametertype.detaileddescription: Defined in TS 29.274, chapter 8.15 and TS 36.413, chapter 9.2.1.18-19.

parametertype.name: BEARER_GBR_UL
parametertype.description: Provides Guaranteed Bit Rate (kbps) in uplink direction for a GBR bearer
parametertype.detaileddescription: Defined in TS 29.274, chapter 8.15 and TS 36.413, chapter 9.2.1.18-19.

parametertype.name: BEARER_GBR_DL
parametertype.description: Provides Guaranteed Bit Rate (kbps) in downlink direction for a GBR bearer
parametertype.detaileddescription: Defined in TS 29.274, chapter 8.15 and TS 36.413, chapter 9.2.1.18-19.

parametertype.name: SGW_BEARER_QCI
parametertype.description: Provides information on a QoS class identifier for each bearer in a bearer setup list
parametertype.detaileddescription: Defined in TS 29.274, chapter 8.15 and TS 36.413, chapter 9.2.1.15.

event.name: CALL_SETUP
event.comment: This event is correlation of INTERNAL_PROC_RRC_CONN_SETUP,INTERNAL_PROC_S1_SIG_CONN_SETUP,INTERNAL_PROC_INITIAL_CTXT_SETUP events based on the GLOBAL_CELL_ID,RAC_UE_REF
